text: Jiss din tum sab ko uss jama honey kay din jama keray ga wohi din hai haar jeet ka aur jo shaks Allah per eman laa ker nek amal keray Allah uss say uss ki buraiyan door ker dey ga aur ussay jannaton mein dakhil keray ga jin kay neechay nehren beh rahi hain jin mein woh hamesha hamesha rahen gay. Yehi boht bari kaamyabi hai
